dtliExcerpt: Nathan Lane gives a tour de force performance as Chauncey Miles, a man who makes his living playing effeminate stereotypes onstage while hiding his true self.
bwwExcerpt: With his hunger to entertain and his precision timing, Lane reminds us why he's a vaudevillian master in those scenes. He could ham it up even more, though, as he did so flamboyantly in the film 'The Birdcage.'
showScoreExcerpt: Nathan Lane gives a tour de force performance as Chauncey Miles, a man who makes his living playing effeminate stereotypes onstage while hiding his true self.
